session_window.msg_connection_failed_desc: Failed to connect to fix session

launcher_tab.title: FIXYL
launcher_tab.sub_title: FIXYL is a FIX test tool support creation of FIX sessions and the exchange of FIX messages. It supports standard and custom FIX dictionaries. This tool is based on Electron and can support cross-platform builds.
launcher_tab.action_title: Create a new profile or select an existing one

session_management.name: Name

session_management.raw_msg_desc: Please note that the field separator should be a printable character instead of the traditional SOH. This will be replaced by SOH when submitting the data

session_management.msg_invalid_message: Given message is not recognized as a fix message. Please enter a valid message.

working_dir_selector.desc: This directory will be used to save all your profile configuations

message_viewer.title: Message Viewer
message_viewer.msg_invalid_message: Given message is not recognized as a fix message. Please enter a valid message.
message_viewer.raw_msg_desc: Please note that the field separator should be defined as a printable character instead of the SOH character. You can add multiple messages with a new line to separate them.

message_diff_viewer.title: Message Diff Viewer
message_diff_viewer.msg_invalid_message: Given message is not recognized as a fix message. Please enter a valid message for { msg }
message_diff_viewer.raw_msg_desc: You can compare two messages using this window. The expected message supports regular expressions (Javascript Type) for the fields and you can define a regular expression using ${<reg exp>} notation. Please note that the field separator should be defined as a printable character instead of the SOH character.
